abstrac: To bring out the best content in your photos and videos using amazing Photo and Video Editing skills and VFX
bio:
I am a professional Video Editor and VFX artist with more than 3 years of experience in the field.
I work on industry-standard tools like Adobe Photoshop, Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, After Effects, Maya and Nuke.

As a Photo Editor, I can edit them to look better which includes photo retouching, background removal, enhancing, etc.

As a Video Editor, I can make them look professional which includes adding titles, transitions, effects, color correction, color grading, etc.
I am more inclined towards the cinematic / storytelling side of editing and would be interested to work on YouTube motivational videos, music videos, wedding videos, travel videos, short films, feature films, etc.

As a VFX Artist, I can apply techniques like green screen replacement, sky replacement, rotoscopy, camera tracking, placing 3D objects in scene, etc.
Please let me know any example output that you have in mind, your vision...so I can better edit the photo / video.

abstrac: Cloud Architect and Software Engineer, I'm here to transform your project into a product
bio:
5 years now that I started working in the field of software engineering. From Developer at Ibaas Inc, I build my way to Associate software engineer in a biggest financial institution. During this path, I had a chance to work as a Lead Developper and software Architect.

Currently certified AWS Solution Architect, Scrum Master ( CSM ), and some other certification in Capital Market and Security advisory ( CSMA ) modules, I'm gradually building my path to Business Analyst or Project Manager.

So the question now is how all this can help you ? Even if that mostly depend of what you want, I'm pretty sure all those skillset are enough to bring any software engineering project from an idea to a reality. I have worked in all the roles required to build a good product. From tester, to developper, Devops Engineer to architecture and more. 

So trust me and you will not regret it.

Hours of operations: During business hour, I can dedicate 1 hours to communicate with all the stakeholders of the project. The main work will be done outside of the business hours

Payment: This mainly depends of the project, will always send you a quote.
